Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On August 20, 2024, JPMorgan Chase & Co. issued a press release announcing the redemption on October 1, 2024 of all of the 1,600,000 outstanding depositary shares, each representing a one-tenth interest in a share of JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Fixed-to-Floating Rate Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series X, par value $1.00 per share and with a liquidation preference of $10,000 (the “Series X Preferred Stock”), pursuant to the optional redemption provisions in the documents governing such depositary shares and the Series X Preferred Stock. A copy of the press release referenced above is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.

subsections.event: Announcement of redemption of all 1,600,000 outstanding depositary shares related to the Fixed-to-Floating Rate Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series X.
subsections.security_details: Each of the 1,600,000 depositary shares represents a one-tenth interest in a share of JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Fixed-to-Floating Rate Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series X, with a par value of $1.00 per share and a liquidation preference of $10,000.
subsections.redemption_provision: The redemption is pursuant to the optional redemption provisions in the documents governing the depositary shares and the Series X Preferred Stock.
subsections.related_exhibit: A copy of the press release is attached as Exhibit 99.
